subject: Football
Weather
lead_paragraph: The temperature remained steady at kickoff, but the wind chill was down to minus 22 at Lambeau Field for the Packers and Giants in the N.F.C. championship game.
snippet: The temperature remained steady at kickoff, but the wind chill was down to minus 22 at Lambeau Field for the Packers and Giants in the N.F.C. championship game.
